body.name: 3 in 1 Baby Bassinet Bedside Sleeper, Breathable Mesh Safe Bedside Bassinet for Baby, Easy Assemble & Folding Portable Bassinet, 5 Height Adjustable Bedside Crib with Storage Basket, Mattress, Wheels
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 54 mins
features: 【3 in 1 Baby Bassinet】This Baby Bassinet Bedstide Sleeper can be used as a standalone baby crib, bedside sleeper attached to the adult bed, or tilting bed for nursing and feeding. Give your baby care and protection all the time, even in the middle of the night. Change the mode freely and enjoy the convenience of one crib for multiple uses.

【Adjustable Height & Angle】With 5 height adjustments (17.32- 22.04inches), our bassinet bedside sleeper offers a customized fit, suitable for parents' beds. Whether by the bed, on the sofa, or elsewhere, it fits perfectly. Before feeding the baby, you can adjust it to a 3-8° incline mode to prevent the baby from refluxing.

【Breathable Mesh & Comfortable Mattress】The two-sided mesh ensures excellent breathability and airflow for your baby's sleep comfort and safety. And mom can easily observe the baby via the mesh. With a built-in canopy that protects against insects and mosquitoes, it's ideal for outdoor use. The included mattress combines high-density foam and a fiber mattress board to ensure your baby's comfortable sleep while protecting their spine.

【Baby's Safety First】The Larex baby bedside bassinet features a lightweight and sturdy aluminum alloy frame, ensuring stability and durability in any mode. The bedside sleeper is certified to meet ASTM and CPSIA standards. It is made from skin-friendly polyester fabric, which better protects your baby's skin. Suitable for babies up to 19.84 lbs or aged 0-5 months.

【User-Friendly Design】Assemble this baby bedside sleeper without the need for tools in just 3 minutes. It can be completely disassembled for easy cleaning (excluding the mattress core). Additionally, the portable folding design and included storage bag offer great convenience for your outings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LAREX baby bedside crib LAREX baby bedside crib is dedicated to creating a comfortable sleeping environment for you and your baby while allowing new parents to have precious moments of rest. Whether you need a shared sleeping space for bonding with your baby, a separate crib for your little one, or a solution for managing baby reflux issues, this versatile bedside crib is designed to meet all your and your baby's needs.

Previous page Standalone Cradle Mode Your little one has their own space to play while staying close to mom, enjoying warm companionship. Baby Bedside Sleeper Easily attaches to most adult beds with fixing straps. Incline Bassinet Easily adjust the height of one side before feeding your baby to effectively prevent reflux. Next page 1 Standalone Cradle Mode 2 Baby Bedside Sleeper 3 Incline Bassinet

Previous page Large Storage Basket For moms to easily store and access baby essentials like clothes, diapers, toys, and more. Breathable Mesh Breathable mesh on both sides ensures optimal airflow while allowing you to keep an eye on your baby Adjustable Height With 5 height adjustments, it offers a customized fit, suitable for parents' beds. Perfect Portability Easy to Carry, Always with Your Baby Next page 1 Large Storage Basket 2 Breathable Mesh 3 Adjustable Height 4 Perfect Portability

Previous page Comfortable Mattress High-density foam and fibre mattress panels for baby's sleeping comfort. Mesh side panel The side zips are easy to access, you can quickly open the side panels to take care of your baby. Wheels with Brake Easily move the baby crib from one room to another while securely locking it in place. Tool-free Assembly Disassemble and fold within minutes, simply press the marbles on the side of the tubes. Next page 1 Comfortable Mattress 2 Mesh side panel 3 Wheels with Brake 4 Tool-free Assembly

reviews.reviewText: Matches my desire for my baby’s crib st bedside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The "3 in 1 Baby Bassinet Bedside Sleeper, Breathable Mesh Safe Bedside Bassinet for Baby" is easy to assemble and worked just as it should. It is easy to move from room to room, and it has a nice style and design to it. I did not have any issues at all while using it. Thank You!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful gift for new mother!
reviews.reviewText: Received it and gifted to mother to be niece! Plenty of size, very comfortable, sturdy quality material so was not afraid of placing her precious one once they arrive to sleep there throughout the night! Not much wrong I could say about it. Yes, I have seen some cheaper, but that's what they looked to be even in the pictures, cheap. Cheap materials and worrisome of how long they would last. With this new bassinet, could easily imagine being around for the next baby they have :-) What you pay is for the quality and it's not even paying much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use Bedside, Stand Alone-Adjustable Height & Incline, Babies Sleep Soundly & Great Quality...
reviews.reviewText: So most parents know just how EXPENSIVE bassinets can be, especially nice ones like this, so I am very glad to have found this! Such a good deal for a quality, mostly portable, sturdy and useful bassinet. I love the design-simple and classic. It is fairly quick and easy to assemble. I love that it is a bedside sleeper, can be used as a stand alone bassinet but also it has adjustable height and an incline feature- which comes in handy for colicky babies or babies with reflux. The mattress included is very soft and comfortable for baby. Babies sleep safe and sound because this is as good a quality, well made and ultra sturdy bassinet. This would make a great shower gift or anytime gift for new parents. It is a awesome deal and I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A good bassinet that works well and looks really cute. Sturdy. Extra storage underneath is really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wood grain looks orange
reviews.reviewText: Setting up this bassinet took less than 10 minutes! It's nice that the side rail drops down so you can use it as a bedside sleeper. The wood print frame looks very pretty in the listing photos, but it is more of a strong orange color in person. The height is easy to adjust between 5 different levels, spanning about 5 inches, so you can the one that works best for the height of your bed. Some bassinets offer a rocking feature but this one does not. The soft sided storage basket on the bottom is spacious and I like that the wheels can be locked in place. I can’t imagine why I would need to use the mesh bug net, since it would be pretty bulky to take outdoors. I don't like that the solid part of the bug net does not stay up on its own, so either the whole thing is collapsed or you have it all the way covered up. I especially like that all the fabric is removable for easier washing! I wish all baby products were made this way. Overall, it's a reasonable bassinet to consider!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You can use this bassinet indoors or outdoors if you wanted to. The mosquito net really helped this summer when we were outside under the canopy but the mosquitos were getting bad. Not one got through the net it holds up great. The bassinet itself is made with very strong material and the wheels rolled really well on the cement. It’s always a plus when there is a storage compartment underneath too. Highly recommend this bassinet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Convenient, and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Its easy assembly and foldable design are ideal for modern living spaces. The breathable mesh ensures safety and comfort for the baby, offering peace of mind. Its height adjustability and wheels add to its convenience, making it effortless to align with any bed and move around. The storage basket is a thoughtful addition, keeping essentials at hand. This bassinet strikes a perfect balance between functionality and comfort, and the inclusion of a mattress is a bonus. Highly recommend for its versatility and practicality.
